text: Busch Stadium is a baseball park in Saint Louis, Missouri. It is the home field of the Major League Baseball team called the St. Louis Cardinals. The stadium was named for the Anheuser-Busch brewing company, which was based in St. Louis for a long time, and once was the owner of the Cardinals. Busch Stadium was built next door to the Cardinals' previous ballpark, Busch Memorial Stadium. == Sources == *Green Cathedrals, by Philip J. Lowry Category:Major League Baseball venues Category:St. Louis Cardinals Category:Sports buildings in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Missouri
title: Busch Stadium
